Html:
Hi all,
I have been doing EDI for many years and recently developed an EDI parser for the company I work for. I had to create a lot of classes, one per EDI doc segment. The parser I created handles the 850, 860, 856, and 810. The OopFactory.X12 dll was included in an app provided to our DBA to parse a medical document. Unfortunately the app did not work, but I noticed the use of this dll. Going through some of the source code provided to the DBA, I noticed the use of the "X12Parser.TransformToX12" and I was like... wow! I asked my self... how does it transform it? There has to be a schema somewhere. So, I googled it and that's how I arrived to this page. I downloaded the source code and I found this project really amazing. It looks like one simply needs to provide the XML with the EDI segment identifiers and it will use the proper transformation file.

Kudos to all contributors! This is really cool!

Is the project still being maintained via GitHub?

Jose.
We are in the process of migrating it to github. More soon.
